result.html: an bhfuil tuirse ortAre you tired?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil tuirse ortAre you tired?

result.eng: By the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ga: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.orig: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.html: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ponchtml: faoin am a ẛroiċ mé an ceann scríbe ḃí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.

result.eng: She gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ga: thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.orig: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.html: thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse ormShe gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ponchtml: ṫug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann aċ cuireann an cógas sin tuirse ormShe gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.

result.html: cuireann an cógas tuirse ormThe medication makes me tired.
result.ponchtml: cuireann an cógas tuirse ormThe medication makes me tired.

result.html: tá tuirse ormI am tired!
result.ponchtml: tá tuirse ormI am tired!

result.eng: I am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ga: tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.orig: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.html: tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásachI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ponchtml: tá brón orm aċ tá tuirse an doṁain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásaċI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.

result.eng: I was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
result.ga: bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díom
result.orig: Bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díom
result.html: bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díomI was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
result.ponchtml: ḃí allas liom agus tuirse i ngaċ ball díomI was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
